org.thethingsnetwork.management

Class LorawanDevice

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.thethingsnetwork.management.LorawanDevice

  • public class LorawanDevice
extends Object
    This class is a representation of a The Things Network LoraWan device
    Author:
    Romain Cambier

        public static LorawanDevice createABP(String _appId,
                                      String _devId,
                                      byte[] _appEui,
                                      byte[] _devEui,
                                      byte[] _devAddr,
                                      byte[] _nwkSKey,
                                      byte[] _appSKey,
                                      boolean _disableFCntCheck,
                                      boolean _uses32BitFCnt)
        Create ABP (activation by personalization) LoraWan data
        Parameters:
        _appId - The application id
        _devId - The device id
        _appEui - The application EUI
        _devEui - The device EUI
        _devAddr - The device address
        _nwkSKey - The network session key
        _appSKey - The application session key
        _disableFCntCheck - Whether if you want to disable fCnt check or not
        _uses32BitFCnt - Whether to use 32 bits frame counters or not
        Returns:
        The corresponding LoraWan data
